overview:
Nealite is a consulting agency specialized in user experience design and web & mobile usability.

Our vision : We believe that the success of web and mobile products depends on their simplicity and ease-of-use. To design interfaces that are clear, readable, understandable and intuitive, we put the user experience - guided by core principles of ergonomy and usability - at the center of our method.

Our method : User-centered design means considering end-users first. We use a variety of methods to analyze users’ behaviors and understand their needs and expectations: in-situ observation, interviews, usability tests, web analytics and international trend research. From strategy through conception and design, we address our clients’ requirements by keeping in mind the people who will use the site or application.

Our mission : With over 30 experts in our multidisciplinary team - usability experts, information architects, artistic directors - and innovative methodologies founded upon design thinking, we help companies develop client loyalty by adapting their image and service to user expectations. Working with Nealite has helped each of our clients grow their audience, increase their revenues and assert their added-value on the web.
